prompt: Create a vibrant music player UI with a light theme and a warm color palette (oranges and yellows). Place a square album cover with rounded corners at the top center, elevated with a soft shadow. Display the song title in bold, dark orange text and the artist name in smaller, muted brown text below it. Include a progress bar with a gradient fill (yellow to orange) and time indicators in a bold font. Position playback controls (skip-previous, play/pause, skip-next) in a row below, using filled buttons with rounded edges and warm colors. Add a volume slider with an icon at the bottom, styled consistently with the warm theme. Use a light beige background and ensure a single-column layout with balanced spacing.
